statement.name: columns-for-table
statement.sql: SELECT c.name, ut.name as typename, c.length as length, c.colid as colid, phystype = pt.name, c.isnullable, c.colorder, isPK = CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sysobjects op JOIN sysindexes i ON i.id = c.id AND op.name = i.name JOIN sysindexkeys ik ON i.id = ik.id AND i.indid = ik.indid AND ik.colid = c.colid WHERE op.xtype = 'PK' AND op.parent_obj = c.id) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, isFK = CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sysforeignkeys f WHERE f.fkeyid = c.id AND f.fkey = c.colid) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, isComputed = columnproperty(c.id, c.name, 'IsComputed') FROM syscolumns c JOIN sysobjects o ON c.id = o.id LEFT JOIN systypes ut ON c.xusertype = ut.xusertype LEFT JOIN systypes pt ON c.xtype = pt.xtype AND pt.xusertype < 256 WHERE o.name = ?

statement.name: params-for-sproc
statement.sql: select C.name, C.colid, C.isOutParam, C.length, T.name as typename from syscolumns C inner join sysobjects O on C.id = O.id inner join systypes T on C.xtype = T.xtype where C.id = {1} order by C.colorder

statement.name: params-for-function
statement.sql: select C.name, C.colid, C.isOutParam, C.length, T.name as typename from syscolumns C inner join sysobjects O on C.id = O.id inner join systypes T on C.xtype = T.xtype where C.id = {1}
